pages.text: 26|20|Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Watashi ga, sore o okonatta no wa jadō ni fumi mayotte ita toki no kotodearu.
26|21|Sorede watashi wa osoroshiku natte, anata gatakara nige dashita. Daga,-nushi wa watashi ni chishiki o sazukete, shito no hitori to nasa reta nodearu.
26|22|Anata wa Isuraeru no shison o dorei to shite okinagara, sore ga watashi ni kōi o shimesu onkeidearu to demo iu nodesu ka.'
26|23|Firuaun wa itta. `Ban'yū no omo to wa, nandesuka.'
26|24|Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no subete no yū no omode ara remasu. Anata gataga moshi (kore o) satottanaraba.'
26|25|Kare (firuaun) wa, sayū no mono ni mukatte itta. `Anata gata wa kikimashita ka.'
26|26|Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Anata gata no shu, mata mukashikara no anata gata no sosen no omode mo ara remasu.'
26|27|Kare (firuaun wa sayū no mono ni) itta. `Anata gata ni tsukawasa reta kono shito wa, hontōni kichigaidesu.'
26|28|Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Azuma to nishi, mata sonoaida ni aru ban'yū no omode ara remasu. Anata gataga moshi rikai suru nodeareba.'
26|29|Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Anata ga, moshi watashi igai ni kami o taterunaraba, watashi wa kanarazu anata o shūjin ni surudeshou.'
26|30|Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Watashi ga moshi, meihakuna nanimono ka o, anata ni motarashite modesu ka.'
26|31|Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Anata no iu koto ga hontōnara, sore o shimeshi nasai.'
26|32|Sorede (mūsā) wa tsue o nageta. Miruga ī. Sore wa akiraka ni hebi to naru.
26|33|Mata kare no tewosashinoberu to, miruga ī. Sore wa dare ga mite mo masshirodearu.
26|34|Kare (firuaun) wa sayū no chōrō-tachi ni itta. `Hontōni kore wa, rōren'na majutsu-shidearu.
26|35|Kare wa sono majutsu de, anata gata o kono kuni kara oidasou to shite iru. Sorede anata gata wa dō shiyō to iu no ka.'
26|36|Kare-ra wa itta. ` (Hisashiku) kare to sono kyōdai o taiki sa se, tsukai no mono o sho toshi ni noko washi,
26|37|subete no rōren'na majutsu-shi o anata no moto ni meshidasa reyo.'
26|38|Sokode majutsu-shi-tachi wa, kimerareta-bi no kimerareta jikoku ni atsume rareta.
26|39|Mata minshū ni mukatte mo,`anata gata wa (zenbu) shūgō shita no ka.' To tsuge rareta.
